Description: Available September 1st Oak Sq sunny 2 plus bedroom on 1st floor of a 2 family, separate entrance to a sun room, large living room, formal dining room with built in cabinet, eat in kitchen with food pantry. 2 good size bedrooms plus a smaller room that can be used as home office or storage. Maximum of 2 occupants is allowed for this unit. Property is located walking distance to Brighton Center and bus to BU, Boston College, Harvard, MIT and downtown Boston.
